maqras.text: 87|1|Shiko no okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai.
87|2|Kare wa sozo shi, totonoe chowa sa seru okata,
87|3|mata kare wa,-ho o sadamete michibiki,
87|4|bokuya o gen wa sa reru okata.
87|5|Sore kara, asaguroku kareta karikabu ni nasa reru.
87|6|Ware wa, anata ni dokuju sa seru yo ni shita. Sorede anata wa wasurenaidearou.
87|7|Arra no o nozomi ga nai kagiri wa. Hontoni kare wa, arawareta mono to kakureta mono o shitte ora reru.
87|8|Ware wa anata ni (michi o) heitan de, an'i ni surudearou.
87|9|Dakara kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa (kiku mono ni) yakudatsu.
87|10|Kunkai wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni ukeire rareyou.
87|11|Daga mottomo fukona mono wa, sore o yokerudearou.
87|12|Kare wa kyodaina hono de yaka reyou.
87|13|Sono Chu de, shini mo, iki mo shinai.
87|14|Daga mizukara kiyometa mono wa kanarazu hae,
87|15|kare no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, reihai o mamoru.
87|16|Iya, anata gata wa gense no seikatsu no kata o konomu.
87|17|Raise ga motto sugure, mata motto eien'na monodearunoni.
87|18|Kore wa hontoni, mukashi no keiten ni ari,
87|19|iburahimu ya musa no keiten ni mo aru.
88|1|Attoteki (jitai no) shosoku ga, anata ni tasshita ka.
88|2|(Aru mono no) kao wa sonohi unadare,
88|3|honeori tsukare kitte,
88|4|moesakaru goku hi de yaka re,
88|5|nietagiru sensui o nomasa reru.
88|6|Kare-ra ni wa nigai ibara no soto ni, shokumotsu wa naku,
88|7|soreha eiyo ni mo narazu, ue mo iyasenai.
88|8|(Soto no aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kanki shi,
88|9|kare-ra wa doryoku shite kokoro michi tari,
88|10|takai rakuen no naka ni 置Ri,
88|11|sokode, munashi (kotoba) o kikanai.
88|12|Soko ni wa, nagareru izumi ga ari,
88|13|takaku age rareta (ikai no) nedoko ga ari,
88|14|taihai ga sonae rare,
88|15|shitone wa suretsu ni narabe rare,
88|16|shikimono ga shikitsume rarete iru.
88|17|Kare-ra wa 骼駝 Ni tsuite, ikaga ni tsukura reta ka o kangaete minai no ka.
88|18|Mata ten ni tsuite, ikaga ni takaku kakage rareta ka,
88|19|mata yamayama ni tsuite, ikaga ni suetsuke rarete iru ka,
88|20|mata daichi ni tsuite, ikaga ni hiroge rarete iru ka o.
88|21|Dakara anata wa kunkai shi nasai. Hontoni anata wa hitori no kunkai-sha nihokanaranai.
88|22|Kare-ra no tame no, shihai-shade wanai.
88|23|Daga dare demo, somuki satte shinko o kyohi surunaraba,
88|24|arra wa saidai no chobatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru.
88|25|Hontoni ware no moto ni, kare-ra wa kaeri kuru nodearu.
88|26|Kare-ra no seisan wa, hontoni ware no nindearu.
89|1|Akatsuki ni oite,
89|2|yoru ni oite,
89|3|gusu to kisu ni oite,
89|4|Sariyuku yoru ni oite (chikau).
89|5|Hontoni kono nakaniha, bunbetsu aru mono e no chikai ga arude wanai ka.
89|6|Anata wa arra ga, ikaga ni ado (no min) o shobun sa reta ka o kangaenai no ka,
89|7|enchu no narabitatsu iramu (no miyako) no koto o,
89|8|kore ni ruisuru mono wa, sono kuni ni oite tsukura reta koto wa nakattade wanai ka.
89|9|Mata tanima no iwa ni horikonda samudo (no min) ya,
89|10|kui nonushi firuaun (no koto o kangaenai no ka).
89|11|Korera wa (subete), sono kuni ni oite ho o koeta-sha-tachi de,
89|12|sono ji ni jaaku o zocho sa seta.
89|13|Sorede anata no omo wa, chobatsu no muchi o kare-ra ni abisekake rareta.
89|14|Hontoni anata no omo wa kanshi no to ni ora reru.
89|15|Sate ningen wa omo ga o kokoromi no tame, kandai ni sa re megumi o sadzuke rareru to, kare wa,`-nushi wa, watashi ni kandaide ara remasu.' To iu.
89|16|Daga kare o kokoromi, onmegumi o herasa reru toki wa,`-nushi wa watashi o, keishi nasaimasu.' To iu.
89|17|Danjite ikenai. Iya, anata gata wa minashigo o taisetsu ni shinai.
89|18|Mata hinja o yashinau tame ni, tagaini hagemasanai.
89|19|Shikamo isan o toriage, goyoku o hoshi 尽 Ni suru.
89|20|Mata anata gata wa, hogaina ai de zaisan o aisuru.
89|21|Danjite ikenai. Daichi ga konagona ni kudaka reru toki,
89|22|-nushi wa, retsu mata retsu no tenshi (o shitagae), rairin nasa reru.
89|23|Mata jigoku wa, sonohi (manoatari ni) hakoba re, sonohi ningen wa hansei surudearou. Daga hansei shita tote, doshite kare no tame ni narou ka.
89|24|Kare wa,`a , watashi no (shorai no) seimei no tame ni,(zenko o) takuwaete itanaraba.' To gen'u.
89|25|Sorede sonohi, dare mo nashi enai hodo no chobatsu o kuwae rare,
89|26|mata dare mo kosoku shi enai hodo ni sokubaku nasa reru.
89|27|(Zenko o tsunda tamashi ni iwa rerudearou. ) O, anshin, taigo shite iru tamashi yo,
89|28|anata no omo ni kaere, kanki shi o man'etsu ni azukatte.
89|29|Anata wa, waga shimo be no naka ni ire.
89|30|Anata wa, waga rakuen ni ire.
